item.title: Visualization of connection between malware and callback server
item.description: Visualization of connection between #malware and callback server ##this is This article is about visualization of connection between malware and callback server for practicing networkx. ##environment Kali Linux python 2.2.17 Rough implementation flow Argument setting 2.suffix organization 3.Hostname acquisition function Scan target directory Network creation Load the required libraries import pefile import sys import argparse import os import pprint import networkx import re from networkx.drawing.nx_agraph import write_dot import collections from networkx.
